About Itel

1. Itel is a smartphone brand introduced in India by the Chinese mobile phone manufacturer Transsion Holdings. It mainly provides ultra-affordable all-round smartphones.

2. Itel has around 1000 service touch points in India. Toll-free No. 18004190525

Itel Vision 1 PRICE IN INDIA

Itel Vision 1 price in India starts from Rs. 5,789. The lowest price of Itel Vision 1 is Rs. 5,789 at flipkart.com. This is 2 GB RAM / 32 GB internal storage base variant of Itel Vision 1 which is available in Gradation Blue, Gradation Purple colour.
